completed_tasks: clel-001: Test infrastructure with Kaocha (71 tests, 395 assertions)
clel-002: Destructuring in let bindings (vector, map, :keys, :or, :as)
clel-003: Destructuring in fn/defn parameters (& rest args)
clel-005: throw support (signal 'error for ex-info, Exception., rethrow)
clel-006: Multi-arity functions (cl-case dispatch on length)
clel-007: case special form (cl-case with default)
clel-012: clel-into runtime function (vectors, lists, hash-tables)
next_actions: clel-014: Add more predicate functions (zero?, pos?, neg?, etc.)
decisions_made: Multi-arity emits cl-case on (length args) with car/cadr/nth bindings
throw maps to (signal 'error ...) with ex-info/constructor/rethrow detection
Swarm workflow: broadcast guidance, monitor with mcp_watch_buffer, send '2' for auto-approve
defmulti emits cl-defgeneric, defmethod emits cl-defmethod with eql type dispatch
:default dispatch value maps to t (catch-all) in Elisp

swarm_conventions.file_conflicts: Multiple slaves editing same file get 'modified since last read' - they re-read and retry
swarm_conventions.non_interference: Never kill other Claude instances' swarmlings - use prefixes (clel-*, mem-*, doc-*)
